sentences.en: "The data showed us it wasn't H1N1 but instead was this rhinovirus infection," Coffin said.
sentences.cn: 考芬说：“数据表明，这并非甲流病毒而是鼻病毒感染。”

sentences.en: A defense against rhinoviruses might nonetheless succeed by exploiting hidden similarities among the rhinovirus strains.
sentences.cn: 虽然如此,通过利用各种鼻病毒之间隐藏着的共同点,针对鼻病毒的某种防御机制仍可获得成功.

sentences.en: But ultimately only a small fraction carried multiple strains of rhinovirus.
sentences.cn: 但其中只有一小部分最终携带多个鼻病毒株。

sentences.en: Not only that, but rhinovirus--the germ that causes colds--can linger on surfaces in your home and in public.
sentences.cn: 不仅如此，鼻病毒——一种引发感冒的细菌——能够残留在你的家里或是公共场所。

sentences.en: The common cold virus, a rhinovirus, is thought to set off half of all asthma attacks.
sentences.cn: 在所有的哮喘病中, 一半是由鼻病毒属, 普通感冒病毒引起.

sentences.en: They were then quarantined and administered nasal drops containing the common - cold - causing rhinovirus.
sentences.cn: 他们随后被隔离,在指导下服用含有感冒病毒的鼻病毒.

trans.tran_en: any of various viruses that occur in the human respiratory tract and cause diseases, such as the common cold
